definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חלם]] (√ of foll.; Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 733 f, cp. Ar. s.alama, cut off (e.g. an ear, anose);—NH [[חֶלֶם]] = BH, so As. ṣalmu, Sab. [[חלם]] Gildemeister: ZMG xxiv (1870), 180 CIS:iv, no. 2, 1. 4, Aram. [[חַלְמָא]], s.almo0, OAram. [[חלמא]], so Nab. Palm. (also [[חלמתא]] of woman's statue)).
